uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data

Class SuperItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data.SuperItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Item
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Drinks, Pizza, Sides

    public abstract class SuperItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements Item
    abstract SuperItem class which implements the Item interface holds all the common methods and fields which all 3 items in this program have
    Author:
    stk4
